argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mat1rhmval.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | mat1rhmval.a | |- A = ( { E } Mat R ) |
| 3 |  | mat1rhmval.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 4 |  | mat1rhmval.o | |- O = <. E , E >. |
| 5 |  | mat1rhmval.f | |- F = ( x e. K |-> { <. O , x >. } ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_mat1rhm | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ E e. V ) -> F e. ( R RingHom A ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_mat1f1o | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ E e. V ) -> F : K -1-1-onto-> B ) |
| 8 |  | #P_snfi | |- { E } e. Fin |
| 9 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ E e. V ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 10 | 2 | #P_matring | |- ( ( { E } e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> A e. Ring ) |
| 11 | 8, 9, 10 | #P_sylancr | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ E e. V ) -> A e. Ring ) |
| 12 | 1, 3 | #P_isrim | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ A e. Ring ) -> ( F e. ( R RingIso A ) <-> ( F e. ( R RingHom A ) /\ F : K -1-1-onto-> B ) ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ E e. V ) -> ( F e. ( R RingIso A ) <-> ( F e. ( R RingHom A ) /\ F : K -1-1-onto-> B ) ) ) |
| 14 | 6, 7, 13 | #P_mpbir2and | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ E e. V ) -> F e. ( R RingIso A ) ) |
